publication.title: A UI Design Case Study and a Prototype of a Travel Search Engine
publication.authors: serguei a. mokhov,mashrur mia,petr solodov,jihed halimi
publication.keyword: Case Study;Design Guideline;Feasibility Study;Open Source;Search Engine;User Centered Design;
publication.abstract: We review a case study of a UI design project for a complete travel search engine system prototype for regular and corporate users. We discuss various usage scenarios, guidelines, and so for, and put them into a web-based prototype with screenshots and the like. We combined into our prototype the best features found at the time (2002) on most travel-like
